LOHERA Name: Town Park- Address: Cecil Road, Enfield- Type: Public park- Local Heritage Asset: 1903-4.  Includes the substantial and impressive iron Gates at the Cecil Road and Essex Road entrances, together with the adjacent drinking fountain, the railings around the Park, and further gates at the Essex Road entrance.

description: Refurbishment of existing public cafe/ indoor play area, involving demolition of rear conservatory and old storage facilities, with opening of new window to form serving hatch at front, rear extension for larger sitting area with extension of toilet facilities, construction of storage space, fence in rear garden with gate, signage at front, painting of exterior, roller shutters at rear and front with front floodlights.
